text.title: Text
text.description: The text content of the message.

content.title: Content
content.description: The message content sent by the agent (can be a string or an array of content parts)

title: AssistantMessage
description:
A message sent by the LLM in response to user input. Used in the LLM context.

Args:
    id (str): The ID of the message
    date (datetime): The date the message was created in ISO format
    name (Optional[str]): The name of the sender of the message
    content (Union[str, List[LettaAssistantMessageContentUnion]]): The message content sent by the agent (can be a string or an array of content parts)
